mapper.insert:
insert into api_sgs_gameinfo
ugsbetid,
txid,
betid,
beton,
betclosedon,
betupdatedon,
timestamp,
roundid,
roundstatus,
userid,
username,
riskamt,
winamt,
winloss,
beforebal,
postbal,
cur,
gameprovider,
gamename,
gameid,
platformtype,
ipaddress,
bettype,
playtype,
betmoney,
netmoney,
bettime,
Platformflag,
createtime,
validmoney
#{ugsbetid},
#{txid},
#{betid},
#{beton},
#{betclosedon},
#{betupdatedon},
#{timestamp},
#{roundid},
#{roundstatus},
#{userid},
#{username},
#{riskamt},
#{winamt},
#{winloss},
#{beforebal},
#{postbal},
#{cur},
#{gameprovider},
#{gamename},
#{gameid},
#{platformtype},
#{ipaddress},
#{bettype},
#{playtype},
#{betmoney},
#{netmoney},
#{bettime},
#{Platformflag},
#{createtime},
#{validmoney}
mapper.update:
update api_sgs_gameinfo
txid=#{txid},
betid=#{betid},
beton=#{beton},
betclosedon=#{betclosedon},
betupdatedon=#{betupdatedon},
timestamp=#{timestamp},
roundid=#{roundid},
roundstatus=#{roundstatus},
userid=#{userid},
username=#{username},
riskamt=#{riskamt},
winamt=#{winamt},
winloss=#{winloss},
beforebal=#{beforebal},
postbal=#{postbal},
cur=#{cur},
gameprovider=#{gameprovider},
gamename=#{gamename},
gameid=#{gameid},
platformtype=#{platformtype},
ipaddress=#{ipaddress},
bettype=#{bettype},
playtype=#{playtype},
betmoney=#{betmoney},
netmoney=#{netmoney},
bettime=#{bettime},
Platformflag=#{Platformflag},
createtime=#{createtime},
validmoney=#{validmoney}
where ugsbetid=#{ugsbetid}
mapper.select: select * from api_sgs_gameinfo a where a.ugsbetid=#{key}
